entry.title: the deleted scene (i'm not dying for you)
entry.summary:
Author: percycarpenter

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,486Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 7

Summary: "I'm not dying for you." says Liam. "I'm not dying for you either." says Theo. Liam moves his eyes to the side, then Theo looks down to his lips. Liam looks back and catches Theo. Theo's eyes lift to meet Liam's. As though he was in a rush, Theo quickly brought his hands up to cup Liam's face and pull Liam's lips to meet his own. Theo's lips pressed against Liam's hard but as quickly as it came, it went away. ¬† or ¬† i saw the rumors of a scrapped thiam kiss... i wish it happened in canon, but i'm guessing it wasn't a real option, but i still liked the idea of it, so here's the au of it!

entry.title: Pure Madness
entry.summary:
Author: Hamahthesith

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 45,194Chapters: 10/20Kudos: 27

Summary: Stiles could still remember the first time his mother explained the importance of epigenetic memory. In spite of the trauma associated with such genetic continuity, she stressed the importance of remembrance in all of its various forms. He hadn't truly understood until a madness claimed Beacon Hills as it's home. Only he has the genetic continuity, the memories, to free the minds of their hometown. With the occasional assistance of an overbearing sour wolf, oh, and his pack of wolves.

entry.title: Run Boy Run
entry.summary:
Author: myswordhandissinging

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,544Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 748

Summary: Stiles Stilinski knew he should have stayed in to finish his assignment that was due on Monday. Instead, he had to go investigate with the pack. He knew he was going to regret it later, and he probably should have listened to his instincts. When he goes missing, the pack finds him in the same spot after days of searching. ¬† Or the one where Stiles goes missing for a couple of days and comes back blind and with magical powers. What did that bitch do to him? ¬† *This was first published in 2013 as a teenager. Now, as an adult with a developed frontal lobe, the age difference between Derek and Stiles is only 2 years, with Stiles as an 18-year-old high school senior and Derek being 20-years-old.

entry.title: Nape bite
entry.summary:
Author: 2005Snow2012

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,629Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 55

Summary: Mates can bite each other's nape to calm the other down. It is a way to show submission and trust. Among mates this caring gesture enforces the bond and connects their souls. It can be playful, soft or even sexual. One night while fighting a new threat the pack gathers in the loft. Lydia and Stiles are sure that they are about to fall in a trap. Derek and the rest of werewolves consider that it's time to act not to plan. entry.title: A Flower Made Of Iron
entry.summary:
Author: XOLissy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,283,254Chapters: 40/?Kudos: 59

Summary: Eden Parker has learned how to survive by staying soft in a world that punishes it. Adopted young, raised in the quiet fractures of Mystic Falls, and carrying truths no one else can see, Eden moves through life balancing grief, loyalty, and a dangerous kind of hope. He loves deeply. He trusts carefully. And he has no idea how many forces‚Äîhuman and otherwise‚Äîare already watching him. When new friendships form, old wounds reopen, and the supernatural begins to bleed into the ordinary, Eden finds himself at the center of something far larger than a high-school existence should allow. Monsters lurk in forests and shadows. Love arrives when it shouldn‚Äôt. Protection becomes complicated. And the past‚Äîburied, sealed, and forgotten‚Äîrefuses to stay quiet. Some bonds are chosen. Some are fated. And some are forged in pain, blood, and devotion. Disclaimer: I do not own the Vampire Diaries, Supernatural, Teen Wolf, Smallville, or The Originals. I do not own any of the characters besides Eden Parker and Ben Monroe. All rights reserved to the writers.

entry.summary:
Author: Vampire_Finch

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,697Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 114

Summary: Au Regency Romance 1820 England. Explicit M/M sex scenes. Viscount Derek Hale has a notorious reputation as a dallier, a trifler, a breaker of Omega hearts and tarnisher of reputatiions, yet devishly handsome, charming and good -natured he is adored by London society. He is the type of aristocratic Alpha young Omega dabeutantes are warned to avoid at all costs. Stiles Stilinski is the 16 year old Omega son of Baron Noah Stilinski and his wife, Claudia. Taken to London for his debut into The Season and make a 'perfect match', Stiles is strenuously warned against any association with Viscount Hale by his cousin and Mother. Accepted into The Ton, Stiles inevitably meets Viscount Hale and more than sparks fly. Can Stiles preserve his and his family's reputation and tame a wild heart or become another notch on the Viscount's bedpost?

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 906Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 58

Summary: Stiles moves to grab his keys from their holder, double checking if he has his phone and everything else on him before opening the front door. Before he could get his foot out, he's confronted with a gruesome, terrifying, and bloody scene right in front of him. The porch is decorated in a red liquid, crimson splashed all across their stairs and flooring, but what Stiles can't keep his eyes away from is the dead man in the center of it all.

entry.title: Twice And For All - Rewritten
entry.summary:
Author: novasillies

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 136,802Chapters: 22/66Kudos: 9

Summary: ‚ÄúW‚Äôs‚Ä¶ What‚Ä¶‚Äù Stiles‚Äô voice slurred, ‚ÄúDad‚Äì ‚Ä¶ forgot-me.‚Äù His head slammed back down into the carpet. Noah stared down at him like he‚Äôd failed as a parent, ‚ÄúGet the hell up, kid. You‚Äôve got school. Against your most hopeful belief, summer didn‚Äôt last forever.‚Äù Stiles felt sick. He couldn‚Äôt do this shit. ‚ÄúYou‚Äôre a Sophomore, now, kid,‚Äù the Sheriff said, a little louder, nudging Stiles with his foot, ‚ÄúDon‚Äôt make me regret teaching you to drive. I‚Äôm not helping you get to school anymore. It‚Äôs time to grow up.‚Äù His voice was fading, his footsteps creaking away, and Stiles just huffed as he muttered into the dust floating past him, little sunbeams shooting past his head, ‚ÄúI did the growing up already.‚Äù ‚ÄúAnd stop wasting my printer ink!‚Äù Noah called out as he left, ‚ÄúThat crap isn‚Äôt cheap!‚Äù - Stiles' spark fucks with the magic of the Ghost Riders and catapults him back to the day Scott got bit. Stranded in the past, the only way to ease his endless guilt is to try his damn best to fix it all. With... varying degrees of success. A rewrite of Twice And For All. it‚Äôll end the same, but we might get there a little differently. #growth (Can and should be read as a standalone/part 1)
